name: Zero G - QaziJam9/BGSJam8/LD37
description:
Made in 3 days for QaziJam9, BGSJam 8, and Ludum Dare 37

Battle your friends in the zero gravity arena. Use your gun to knock the other players out of the arena.

Online multiplayer only.

WASD - Move/Fly

Left Click - Shoot

Left Shift - Boost

Created live at https://www.twitch.tv/qazitv/
